content: Write a short blog post about  DAVDroid etc: 'Send contacts to CardDAV'.

Are you tired of manually entering contacts on your phone? Do you wish there was an easier way to sync your address book with your favorite online contact manager? Look no further, because DAVDroid is here to save the day!

DAVDroid is an open-source app that allows you to seamlessly sync your contacts, calendar, and tasks with CardDAV and CalDAV servers. But today, we're going to focus on its amazing ability to send contacts to CardDAV.

So, what is CardDAV, you might ask? CardDAV is an internet standard that allows users to store, share, and sync their address books across different devices and platforms. By using CardDAV, you can ensure that your contacts are up-to-date and accessible wherever you go.

With DAVDroid, sending contacts to CardDAV becomes a breeze. The app is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, making the process seamless for both beginners and advanced users. Here's how it works:

1. Install DAVDroid on your Android device from the Google Play Store.
2. Open the app and navigate to the "Contacts" tab.
3. Click on the "Send contacts" option.
4. Choose the desired contact or contacts you wish to send to your CardDAV server.
5. Select your preferred CardDAV account from the list or add a new account if needed.
6. Hit the "Send" button, and voila! Your contacts are now synced to your CardDAV server.

The best part about DAVDroid is that it supports multiple CardDAV accounts, allowing you to sync your contacts across various servers seamlessly. Whether you use ownCloud, FastMail, Nextcloud, or any other CardDAV server, DAVDroid has got you covered.

Furthermore, DAVDroid offers advanced features like two-way sync, periodic background sync, and various customization options to fit your needs. You can even sync groups and categories, ensuring that your address book remains organized.

In conclusion, DAVDroid is a game-changer for anyone looking to send contacts to CardDAV. Its user-friendly interface, robust features, and seamless syncing capabilities make it the perfect companion for managing your address book.

So, say goodbye to the hassle of manually adding contacts and embrace the convenience of DAVDroid. With just a few taps, you can have your contacts synced and ready to go. Give it a try and experience the magic of effortless contact management!
